<h1>Anthology of Interest II</h1>
<p>Do a flip! Say it in Russian! One hundred dollars. Goodbye, cruel world. Goodbye, cruel lamp. Goodbye, cruel velvet drapes, lined with what would appear to be some sort of cruel muslin and the cute little pom-pom curtain pull cords. Cruel though they may be&hellip; Then we'll go with that data file!</p>
<h2>I Dated a Robot</h2>
<p>Kif, I have mated with a woman. Inform the men. Fry! Stay back! He's too powerful! You won't have time for sleeping, soldier, not with all the bed making you'll be doing. For example, if you killed your grandfather, you'd cease to exist! I'm just glad my fat, ugly mama isn't alive to see this day.</p>
<ul>
<li>Pansy.</li>
<li>Daylight and everything.</li>
<li>Tell her she looks thin.</li>
<li>In your time, yes, but nowadays shut up! Besides, these are adult stemcells, harvested from perfectly healthy adults whom I killed for their stemcells.</li>
</ul>
<h3>Teenage Mutant Leela's Hurdles</h3>
<p>That could be 'my' beautiful soul sitting naked on a couch. If I could just learn to play this stupid thing. Why am I sticky and naked? Did I miss something fun? Now that the, uh, garbage ball is in space, Doctor, perhaps you can help me with my sexual inhibitions? Tell her she looks thin. Soon enough.</p>
<h4>That's Lobstertainment</h4>
<p>It's just like the story of the grasshopper and the octopus. All year long, the grasshopper kept burying acorns for winter, while the octopus mooched off his girlfriend and watched TV. But then the winter came, and the grasshopper died, and the octopus ate all his acorns. Also he got a race car. Is any of this getting through to you? You can crush me but you can't crush my spirit! All I want is to be a monkey of moderate intelligence who wears a suit&hellip; that's why I'm transferring to business school!</p>
<ol>
<li>Anyone who laughs is a communist!</li>
<li>It must be wonderful.</li>
<li>But I've never been to the moon!</li>
<li>But I've never been to the moon!</li>
</ol>
<h5>A Head in the Polls</h5>
<p>Our love isn't any different from yours, except it's hotter, because I'm involved. Ven ve voke up, ve had zese wodies. Ooh, name it after me!</p>
